message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
You can't fool me, I'll take the bigger share this time!
You're being greedy, Bob! Meet me in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but only if you meet me at 55%
You're not budging, Bob? I'll give you a bit more, but not much!
I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to give up yet!
Last chance, Bob! I'm not going to give you any more!
I'll give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
